basic_attributes.name: Health Points
basic_attributes.description: Health Points. Once it drops to 0, the character dies and the game ends.

basic_attributes.name: Mana Points
basic_attributes.description: Mana Points. Consumed when using spells.

basic_attributes.name: Strength
basic_attributes.description: Strength. Affects the character's physical attack power, HP, and physical defense.

basic_attributes.name: Agility
basic_attributes.description: Agility. Affects the character's physical hit rate, physical evasion rate, and physical penetration.

basic_attributes.name: Stamina
basic_attributes.description: Stamina. Affects the character's HP, physical defense, and magic defense.

basic_attributes.name: Intellect
basic_attributes.description: Intellect. Affects the character's magic attack power, MP, and magic defense.

basic_attributes.name: Spirit
basic_attributes.description: Spirit. Affects the character's magic hit rate, magic evasion rate, and magic penetration.

general_attributes.name: Critical Hit Chance
general_attributes.description: Critical Hit Chance. The probability of dealing critical damage to enemies.

general_attributes.name: Critical Damage
general_attributes.description: Critical Damage. The base critical damage is 150% of normal damage.

general_attributes.name: HP Regen/Turn
general_attributes.description: HP Regen/Turn. The health automatically restored per turn.

general_attributes.name: MP Regen/Turn
general_attributes.description: MP Regen/Turn. The mana automatically restored per turn.

general_attributes.name: Health Steal
general_attributes.description: Health Steal. The health absorbed with each attack.

general_attributes.name: Mana Steal
general_attributes.description: Mana Steal. The mana absorbed with each attack.

physical_attributes.name: Physical Attack Power
physical_attributes.description: Physical Attack Power. Deals physical damage to enemies.

physical_attributes.name: Physical Defense
physical_attributes.description: Physical Defense. Resists physical damage from enemies.

physical_attributes.name: Physical Hit Rate
physical_attributes.description: Physical Hit Rate. The probability of hitting an enemy, default 90%.

physical_attributes.name: Physical Evasion Rate
physical_attributes.description: Physical Evasion Rate. The probability of dodging an enemy's attack, default 0%.

physical_attributes.name: Physical Penetration
physical_attributes.description: Physical Penetration. Ignores the enemy's defense.

magical_attributes.name: Magic Hit Rate
magical_attributes.description: Magic Hit Rate. The probability of a spell hitting an enemy, default 90%.

magical_attributes.name: Magic Evasion Rate
magical_attributes.description: Magic Evasion Rate. The probability of dodging an enemy's magical attack, default 0%.

magical_attributes.name: Magic Penetration
magical_attributes.description: Magic Penetration. Ignores the enemy's magic defense.
